mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, up_code, code, name, type_code, pym, wbm, is_end, is_require, is_valid, default_vlaue, min_value, max_value, gender_code, min_age, max_age, patient_code_ref, sys_code_ref, sys_code_default, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,is_single_template, (select name from sys_code where code = sys_code_ref and hosp_code = #{hospCode}) as sysCodeRefName, (select name from sys_code_detail where c_code = 'BLBRGLX' and value = patient_code_ref and hosp_code = #{hospCode}) as patientCodeRefName,is_sys_date from emr_element where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and code = #{code}
select code from emr_element where sys_code_ref = #{sysCodeRef} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.insert: insert into emr_element(id,hosp_code, up_code, code, name, type_code, pym, wbm, is_end, is_require, is_valid, default_vlaue, min_value, max_value, gender_code, min_age, max_age, patient_code_ref, sys_code_ref, sys_code_default, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,is_single_template,is_sys_date) values (#{id},#{hospCode}, #{upCode}, #{code}, #{name}, #{typeCode}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{isEnd}, #{isRequire}, '1', #{defaultVlaue}, #{minValue}, #{maxValue}, #{genderCode}, #{minAge}, #{maxAge}, #{patientCodeRef}, #{sysCodeRef}, #{sysCodeDefault}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime},#{isSingleTemplate},#{isSysDate})

INSERT INTO emr_element_match ( id, hosp_code, emr_element_id, emr_element_code, emr_element_name, insure_emr_id, insure_emr_code, insure_emr_name, insure_up_value, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hospCode}, #{emrElementId}, #{emrElementCode}, #{emrElementName}, #{insureEmrId}, #{insureEmrCode}, #{insureEmrName}, #{insureUpValue}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime} )
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, up_code, code, name, type_code, pym, wbm, is_end, is_require, is_valid, default_vlaue, min_value, max_value, gender_code, min_age, max_age, patient_code_ref, sys_code_ref, sys_code_default, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,is_single_template from emr_element where up_code = #{upCode} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} order by code DESC limit 1
mapper.update:
update emr_element
up_code = #{upCode},
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
type_code = #{typeCode},
pym = #{pym},
wbm = #{wbm},
is_end = #{isEnd},
is_require = #{isRequire},
is_valid = #{isValid},
default_vlaue = #{defaultVlaue},
min_value = #{minValue},
max_value = #{maxValue},
gender_code = #{genderCode},
min_age = #{minAge},
max_age = #{maxAge},
patient_code_ref = #{patientCodeRef},
sys_code_ref = #{sysCodeRef},
sys_code_default = #{sysCodeDefault},
is_single_template = #{isSingleTemplate},
is_sys_date = #{isSysDate},
where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.select: select `code` id,name label,up_code as parentId from emr_element where hosp_code = #{hospCode}
select id emrElementId,`code` id, code ,name , concat(name ,' 【',code,'】' ) label , up_code as parentId from emr_element where hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id sysCodeDetailId,value as id,value,name, concat(name ,' 【',value,'】' ) label , ifnull(up_value,'INSURE_EMR') as parentId from sys_code_detail where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and c_code = 'INSURE_EMR'

select id,emr_element_id,emr_element_code,emr_element_name,insure_emr_id,insure_emr_code,insure_emr_name,crte_id,crte_name,crte_time from emr_element_match where hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and ( emr_element_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or emr_element_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or insure_emr_code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or insure_emr_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM emr_element_match WHERE hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id IN
#{id}
